title: Topic 005 Question 020
body: The Global Administrator role is assigned to your user account.
You have a user named Admin1.
You create an eDiscovery case named Case1.
You need to ensure that Admin1 can view the results of Case1.
options: From the Microsoft Entra admin center, assign a role group to Admin1.
From the Microsoft Purview compliance portal, assign a role group to Admin1.
From the Microsoft 365 admin center, assign a role to Admin1.
